short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An emoji typing tool to make emoji inputs faster and easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Typemoji is a tool that makes it easier to type emojis on PCs and Desktops, using the popular discord style :emoji: format for typing. 

Currently, typing emojis is a long task on chrome other than on specific messaging sites. Typemoji removes this extra effort. Simply type :sob: for ðŸ˜­ and so on. 

This works on almost all websites on Chrome, including Google Meet!

Go on and have fun!
